Object.Name: IPSO Light Control
Object.Description1: Description: This Object is used to control a light source, such as a LED or other light. It allows a light to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100. An optional colour setting enables a string to be used to indicate the desired colour.

Item.Name: On/Off
Item.Description: This resource represents a light, which can be controlled, the setting of which is a Boolean value (1,0) where 1 is on and 0 is off.

Item.Name: Dimmer
Item.Description: This resource represents a light dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

Item.Name: On Time
Item.Description: The time in seconds that the light has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Item.Name: Cumulative active power
Item.Description: The total power in Wh that the light has used.

Item.Name: Power factor
Item.Description: The power factor of the light.

Item.Name: Colour
Item.Description: A string representing a value in some color space

Item.Name: Sensor Units
Item.Description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.
